amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to end "too big to fail" bailouts for Wall Street mega-banks (over $500 billion in total assets).

vote.text: Amendment SA 994 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 994 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Brown. (consideration: CR S1995-1997, S2011; text: CR S1996-1997) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to end "too big to fail" bailouts for Wall Street mega-banks (over $500 billion in total assets).
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 994 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 994 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Brown.
